cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.14...3.22)

project(
  catch2
  LANGUAGES CXX
)

add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} ${SRC_FILES} ${HEADER_FILES})

target_include_directories(
  ${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/src
)
